Name: Ymittos Center
Description: The central area of Ymittos, known for its local shops, cafes, and residential streets.

Name: Ano Ymittos
Description: A hillside neighborhood that offers panoramic views of Athens, a more peaceful area with fewer commercial spaces.

Name: Agios Ioannis Ymittos
Description: A tranquil residential neighborhood located near the foot of Mount Ymittos, known for its scenic parks and suburban feel.
